# Event Management and Staging Services Request for Proposal (RFP)

## Preface
The Canada Post Corporation invites qualified contractors to participate in a request for proposal (RFP) aimed at establishing Standing Offer Agreements to provide event management and staging services on an as-and-when-required basis.

## Proposal Overview
The proposed term of the Standing Offer Agreements will be for a period of three years with the option to renew for two additional one-year periods. Contractors selected through this RFP will not be guaranteed any work but may be called upon to provide quantity quotes for specific events as described in a subsequent statement of requirements.

## Tender Details
- **Reference Number**: MX-22636074756
- **Solicitation Number**: Doc 481151593
- **Publication Date**: December 12, 2022
- **Tender Closing Date**: February 10, 2023 2:00 PM (EST)
- **Expected Contract Start Date**: February 11, 2023
- **Expected Contract End Date**: February 11, 2023

## Procurement Information
- **Procurement Category**: Service (SRV)
- **Procurement Method**: Competitive – Open Biddings
- **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), and Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA).

## Contracting Entity
- **Contracting Entity**: Canada Post Corporation
- **Contracting Entity Address**: N0751-2701 Riverside Drive, Ottawa, Ontario K1A 0B1, Canada

## Proposal Submission
- **Proposal Submission Instructions**: Proposals must be submitted electronically through ARIBA Sourcing Event: http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14653173.
- **Bidding and Documents**: Available on MERX: http://www.merx.com. Fees may apply; see https://www.merx.com/public/pricing for more information.

- **Contact Phone**: [Not provided]
